Content:: non-discrimination between russian-operated and seperatist-operated equipment This is a list of equipment of the armed forces of the Donetsk People's Republic and Luhansk People's Republic currently used in the Russo-Ukrainian War.  The ongoing war makes the list below include tentative estimates. T72BM not exported from Russia.[18][22] One seen in convoy in Sverdlovsk.[22] A[5][10][26]). Several captured in 2022[27] Seen on videos filmed by the separatists.[5] Also seen destroyed in Novosvitlivka.[48][unreliable source?] [64][65] Doubts where raised about their local production.[124]
Title: List of equipment used by Russian separatist forces of the war in Donbas - Wikipedia
